title: Lower Priority Queue - BugSplat
body:
During a ranked game, my internet cut out but about a minute later it came back, but when i tried logging back into league, it kept giving me BugSplat crashes and i couldnt log in at all, meaning i couldnt finish my ranked match

Now i have 5 lower priority queues and I want to know if i can get those removed as this wasnt my own doing.

replies.body:
Hey there,

First off, leaverbuster punishments **can not** and **will not** be removed under any circumstances, the system is automated for a reason, read more about the leaverbuster system [here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).

Now onto the issue with your game, are you still experiencing this issue? Have you attempted to [repair your client](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes#wq6)?
